item.title: Changing background + removing fires + removing rs logo [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

cruel ko:

go to spirites and look for the pic with your background picture then open with>paint.

I edited cruel’s reply. Also when you’re editing it, go to the “paste from” option and paste whatever you want over it. You can

find another back round you like by getting another client and pasting something from their sprites.
